availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel H. Smith (Logan County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Obediah Smith and Matilda Smith. Married to Mary E. McElmore Smith on January 15, 1862. Resident of Logan County in 1850. Farm laborer in Logan County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 30. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 134. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Green Precinct, p. 26. Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900, Ancestry, Logan County, Kentucky, 1862. Find A Grave, "S. H. Smith (1840-1923)," Memorial #60247356, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60247356/s.-h.-smith (accessed May 26, 2017).
